channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump "wouldn't oppose" Charlie Kirk national holiday, White House says
item.description: President Trump likely "wouldn't oppose" Congress creating a national holiday honoring Charlie Kirk , White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt sai...

item.title: Scoop: Pentagon restricts speaking engagements alongside media crackdown
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth in a memo this month cemented restrictions on when, where and how the military and Pentagon leaders can engage with the...

item.title: Disney bringing Jimmy Kimmel back Tuesday
item.description: The Walt Disney Company said it will bring back "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" on Tuesday after taking the show off-air nearly a week ago following criticism ov...

item.title: Trump's immigration crackdown could stunt his blockbuster economic aims
item.description: President Trump is aiming for blockbuster economic growth and a boom in America's manufacturing and AI industries. That might all be undercut by a dea...

item.title: Exclusive: Trump's letting Putin "embarrass" the U.S., Sen. Shaheen says
item.description: President Trump has let Russian President Vladimir Putin "embarrass" him and the entire U.S. by failing to respond as Russia crossed "seven red lines,...

item.title: Trump’s new demands on Justice Department raise alarm among prosecutors
item.description: The president is rapidly intensifying the pressure he’s putting on federal prosecutors, prompting some observers to question whether their traditional...

item.title: Mamdani pulls out of event with ABC station after Kimmel suspension
item.description: The New York City mayoral candidate said network leaders “have put their bottom line ahead of their responsibility” to a free press.

item.title: Supreme Court allows Trump to fire Democratic member of trade commission
item.description: The justices overturned a lower court injunction that reinstated Rebecca Slaughter to her job with the agency that oversees antitrust and consumer pro...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Kirk’s memorial was an emblem of the Trump era — and a sign of what’s ahead
item.description: The event showed how the line that used to separate religion and politics may no longer exist, particularly on the right.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
